mcq.statement: Choose an option that is correct according to the standard use of English:The Japanese couple on the back of the coach was obviously newly-weds.

options.a: The Japanese couple on the back of the coach was obviously newly-weds.
options.b: The Japanese couple at the back of the coach were obviously newly-weds.
options.c: The Japanese couples at the back of the coach was obviously newly-weds.
options.d: The Japanese couple in the back of the coach was obviously newly-weds.
